description: Implementation of JPEG 2000 Core Coding (Part 1) that constrains the use of variables in the specification (restricts the codestream) to serve 2K presentations within the Digital Cinema Initiative's DCP_1_0.  The restrictions include image size limited to 2,048 x 1,080 pixels, no more than one tile, 12-bit bit depth per component, no more than 5 decomposition levels, CPRL compression order, and maximum compressed bytes per frame (aggregate of color components) of 1,302,083 (24 fps) and 651,041 (48 fps).
name: ISO/IEC 15444-1:2004. Information technology -- JPEG 2000 image coding system -- Part 1: Core coding system, Amendment 1: Codestream Restrictions, Profile 3 (formal name); JPEG 2000 Profile 3 (common name)
